benefits.name: Acidental Injury
benefits.description: This benefit pays fixed amounts in the event of a covered accident resulting in an injury that required medical care.

benefits.name: Pharmaceutical Discounts
benefits.description: This service provides discounts on the retail price for thousands of medications at participating pharmacies nationwide.

benefits.name: Hospitalization Insurance
benefits.description: This benefit pays fixed amounts for covered medical events provided at a hospital.

benefits.name: Telemedicine
benefits.description: This service provides 24 hour a day access to health care providers by phone or the internet.
